comment_on_glottocode: Ingrian Finnish is a variety of Glottolog's "Finnish" (finn1318) spoken in Ingria. It is different from standard Finnish.

source_of_information: условное решение на основе WALS (8-9) и материалов Ю. Конума

comment_on_glottocode: Kalmyk is a variety of the Glottolog's "Oirad-Kalmyk-Darkhat" (kalm 1243) spoken to the North-West of the Caspian Sea
In Glottolog, this variety is referred to as "Central Khmer"
In Glottolog, this variety is referred to as "Standard Latvian"
Glottolog's loma1260 is referred to as "Loma (Liberia)"; the actual data were gathered in Guinea (fialect Woi-Bhalaga)
Standard Albanian is most closely related to Glottolog's Northern Tosk Albanian (tosk1239)
This idiom is Glottolog's North Azerbaijani (nort2697)
In Glottolog, Kalderash is shown as a subdialect of Vlax Romani. The actual data were gathered from Kalderash Romani speakers living in Russia
